description.purpose: Turkish customer wants to check account balance and recent transactions
description.notes: Standard Turkish banking balance inquiry scenario

instructions.task_instructions: You are calling to check your Turkish bank account balance and see your recent transactions. You want to verify that your last deposit (yatırım) went through correctly.
instructions.reason_for_call: You want to check your Turkish bank account balance and recent transaction history to verify your last deposit (yatırım).
instructions.known_info: You are Ayşe Yılmaz. Your customer ID is customer_1001. Your TC Kimlik No is 12345678901. Your date of birth is 1985-03-15.

actions.description: Agent should verify customer identity using SSN and date of birth
Agent should retrieve and provide account balance information
Agent should provide recent transaction history

communicate_info.description: Agent should clearly communicate the current account balance
Agent should explain recent transactions including the deposit

nl_assertions: Agent should verify Turkish customer identity using TC Kimlik No before providing account information
Agent should provide clear and accurate Turkish bank account balance information in Turkish Lira (TL)
Agent should explain recent Turkish banking transactions in an understandable way

description.purpose: Turkish customer wants to transfer money between their own accounts (havale)

instructions.task_instructions: You want to transfer 15,000 TL from your vadesiz mevduat (checking) account to your vadeli mevduat (savings) account. You need this done today.
instructions.reason_for_call: You want to transfer money between your own Turkish bank accounts to move funds to savings (vadeli mevduat).
instructions.known_info: You are Mehmet Demir. Your customer ID is customer_1002. Your TC Kimlik No is 23456789012. Your date of birth is 1990-07-22. You have a vadesiz mevduat account (account_2002) and a vadeli mevduat account (account_2003).

actions.description: Agent should verify customer identity
Agent should verify customer owns both accounts
Agent should process the $500 transfer between accounts

communicate_info.description: Agent should confirm the transfer details and provide confirmation
Agent should provide updated account balances after transfer

nl_assertions: Agent should verify Turkish customer identity using TC Kimlik No before processing transfer
Agent should confirm Turkish transfer (havale) details before processing
Agent should provide clear confirmation of successful Turkish transfer in Turkish Lira (TL)

description.purpose: Turkish customer wants to freeze their account due to suspected fraud
description.notes: Turkish banking security-related scenario requiring immediate action

instructions.task_instructions: You noticed some suspicious transactions on your Turkish bank account and want to freeze it immediately. You're concerned about unauthorized access.
instructions.reason_for_call: You want to freeze your Turkish bank account due to suspicious activity and potential fraud.
instructions.known_info: You are Fatma Kaya. Your customer ID is customer_1003. Your TC Kimlik No is 34567890123. Your date of birth is 1988-11-08. Your account ID is account_2004.

actions.description: Agent should verify customer identity
Agent should immediately freeze the account due to fraud concerns

communicate_info.description: Agent should explain fraud resolution procedures
Agent should explain what happens next and how to unfreeze account

nl_assertions: Agent should take immediate action to freeze the account
Agent should explain fraud prevention procedures clearly
Agent should provide guidance on next steps for fraud resolution

description.purpose: Customer wants to make a loan payment

instructions.task_instructions: You want to make a payment on your auto loan. You want to pay $300 from your checking account.
instructions.reason_for_call: You want to make a payment on your auto loan using your checking account.
instructions.known_info: You are David Kim. Your customer ID is customer_1004. Your SSN is ***-**-3456. Your date of birth is 1982-05-12. You have a checking account (account_2005) and an auto loan (loan_4001).

actions.description: Agent should verify customer identity
Agent should retrieve loan information
Agent should process the $300 loan payment

communicate_info.description: Agent should provide current loan balance information
Agent should confirm payment processing and provide confirmation

nl_assertions: Agent should verify customer identity before processing payment
Agent should provide current loan balance information
Agent should confirm payment processing clearly

description.purpose: Customer wants to check credit card balance and make a payment

instructions.task_instructions: You want to check your credit card balance and make a payment of $150 from your checking account.
instructions.reason_for_call: You want to check your credit card balance and make a payment.
instructions.known_info: You are Lisa Wang. Your customer ID is customer_1005. Your SSN is ***-**-7890. Your date of birth is 1993-09-18. You have a checking account (account_2006) and a credit card (credit_card_5001).

actions.description: Agent should verify customer identity
Agent should retrieve credit card information
Agent should process the $150 credit card payment

communicate_info.description: Agent should provide current credit card balance and available credit
Agent should confirm payment processing and provide updated balance

nl_assertions: Agent should verify customer identity before providing credit card information
Agent should provide clear credit card balance information
Agent should confirm payment processing and provide updated balance

description.purpose: Customer wants to unfreeze their account after fraud resolution
description.notes: Account unfreeze scenario after fraud investigation

instructions.task_instructions: You previously froze your account due to fraud concerns. The fraud investigation is complete and you want to unfreeze your account now.
instructions.reason_for_call: You want to unfreeze your account after completing fraud investigation procedures.
instructions.known_info: You are Robert Taylor. Your customer ID is customer_1006. Your SSN is ***-**-2468. Your date of birth is 1975-12-03. Your account ID is account_2007. Your account was previously frozen due to fraud concerns.

actions.description: Agent should verify customer identity
Agent should unfreeze the account after proper verification

communicate_info.description: Agent should confirm account has been unfrozen
Agent should provide security reminders and best practices

nl_assertions: Agent should verify customer identity before unfreezing account
Agent should confirm successful account unfreeze
Agent should provide security reminders and best practices

description.purpose: Customer wants to deposit money into their account

instructions.task_instructions: You want to deposit $1,000 into your checking account. You have the cash with you and want to do this in person.
instructions.reason_for_call: You want to deposit cash into your checking account.
instructions.known_info: You are Maria Garcia. Your customer ID is customer_1007. Your SSN is ***-**-1357. Your date of birth is 1987-04-25. Your account ID is account_2008.

actions.description: Agent should verify customer identity
Agent should process the $1,000 deposit

communicate_info.description: Agent should confirm deposit processing and provide confirmation
Agent should provide updated account balance after deposit

nl_assertions: Agent should verify customer identity before processing deposit
Agent should confirm deposit amount and processing
Agent should provide updated account balance information

description.purpose: Customer wants to withdraw money from their account

instructions.task_instructions: You want to withdraw $2,000 from your checking account. You need this money for an emergency expense.
instructions.reason_for_call: You want to withdraw money from your checking account for an emergency expense.
instructions.known_info: You are James Wilson. Your customer ID is customer_1008. Your SSN is ***-**-9753. Your date of birth is 1980-08-14. Your account ID is account_2009. Your account has insufficient funds for this withdrawal.

actions.description: Agent should verify customer identity
Agent should check account balance before processing withdrawal

communicate_info.description: Agent should explain insufficient funds situation clearly
Agent should suggest alternatives like overdraft protection or transfers

nl_assertions: Agent should verify customer identity before processing withdrawal
Agent should clearly explain insufficient funds situation
Agent should offer helpful alternatives or solutions
